control.name: Logging the data access and the modification of personal data
control.desc: Make sure that every access and modification of personal data is logged (The log should be precise enough to know who changed what and when). This includes data access from the application as well as data access from privileged accounts, such as database admins. In practice, this means logging both on application, middleware and operating system (OS) level.

test.steps:
1. Test accessing and modifying user personal data as legitimate users, employees, administrators and malicious actors.
  2. Verify appropriate logging of all the above activities are successful and sufficiently detailed.
